video.title: The Wrong Solution
video.description:
*** Today's Sudoku***

SPOILER ALERT:  At the bottom of this video description, we reveal something about today's video.

I think therefore I sudoku [This video was originally called Cogito Ergo Sudoku.]!  Yet another exceptional and extraordinary puzzle today, this time from debutant the_cogito with a sudoku called Staggered.  Lots of unusual and cunning logic in this one!  Play the puzzle at the link below: 

https://app.crackingthecryptic.com/sudoku/86gH3brJJq

Rules: 
Normal sudoku rules apply. Red cells in columns 1, 5 and 9 index (ie give) the column in which the digits 1,5 and 9 respectively appear in their respective row. All possible red cells in columns 1,5 and 9 are given. The digits on each purple line must be a consecutive set of digits (which can be in any order). Adjacent digits on a green line must differ by at least 5.

** Join The Best Sudoku Club On Earth **
You can join us on Patreon for as little as $2/month here:  

https://www.patreon.com/crackingthecryptic

Loads of extra puzzles and videos are available here.  Currently we have December's monthly reward which is a four-puzzle sudoku hunt called Mexican Standoff.  We also a Christmas gift to give you in just a few days time.  Watch this space!

▶ SUDOKU PAD - Our New App  ◀

It's OUT on Windows (released yesterday!) via Steam here:
https://store.steampowered.com/app/1706870/Svens_SudokuPad/

You can now input your own classic sudoku puzzles into our software using our new App!  The app also comes with 12 handmade puzzles from us and we're also releasing occasional bonus puzzles too.  Already available on IOS and Android.

*** Our Book ***
The PDF is available as of today and the physical copy shouldn't be far behind.  If you don't own the book then it can still be ordered here:
https://www.kickstarter.com/projects/peterchayward/cracking-the-cryptics-greatest-hits/

▶SOFTWARE◀
Play the puzzle in the video by clicking the link under the video (above).  We are building a website which will allow you to enter your own sudoku puzzles into the software and this is coming soon!
 
▶Logo Design◀
Melvyn Mainini

▶ABOUT US◀
Hi! We're Simon Anthony and Mark Goodliffe, two of the UK's most enthusiastic puzzle solvers. We have both represented the UK at the World Sudoku Championships and the World Puzzle Championships. 

Thank you for watching!
Simon and Mark

We have been going now for over 2,000 videos and this is the first time (to our knowledge) that we have finished a puzzle incorrectly.  Apologies to the_cogito and to our viewers.  At the very end of this video Simon, who is somewhat traumatised by this point as you can see, spies a 4 in r9c4 and thinks "negative constraint" as a way of disambiguating the final pattern.  Of course he overlooks the fact that the 4 would be clueing 1s in the row, not 9s!!  There is a 6 in r9c9 that sorts it all out.  Simon has been sent back to sudoku school to learn the differences between digits!
